import axios from"axios";import{GET_VIDEOGAMES,// POST_VIDEOGAME,
UPDATE_RENDER_ARRAY}from"./action-types";export const getAllVideogames=()=>{return async function(dispatch){const apiData=await axios.get("/videogames");const allVideogamesArray=apiData.data;dispatch({type:GET_VIDEOGAMES,payload:allVideogamesArray});};};export const updateRenderArray=newArray=>{return{type:UPDATE_RENDER_ARRAY,payload:newArray};};
